    • saveGame

      public void saveGame(int game_id, String username, int no_opponents, int attacks_made, Time duration, boolean won, int ships_remaining, boolean game_over) throws SQLException
      saving a game to the database
      Specified by:
      saveGame in interface GameDao
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player who played the game
      no_opponents - the number of opponents in the game
      attacks_made - the number of attacks made during the game
      duration - the duration of the game
      won - true if the user won the game, false otherwise
      ships_remaining - the users number of ships remaining at the end of the game
      game_id - the id of the game
      game_over - to indicate if game has completed
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there has been any error with communicating with the database

      public void saveGame(int game_id, String username, int no_opponents, int attacks_made, Time duration, boolean won, int ships_remaining, boolean game_over, String game_path) throws SQLException
      saving a game to the database
      Specified by:
      saveGame in interface GameDao
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player who played the game
      no_opponents - the number of opponents in the game
      attacks_made - the number of attacks made during the game
      duration - the duration of the game
      won - true if the user won the game, false otherwise
      ships_remaining - the users number of ships remaining at the end of the game
      game_id - id of the game
      game_over - if the game is over
      game_path - the location of the game
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there has been any error with communicating with the database
